ISSUE.TITLE: Swift Supabase | Upload/Replace file documentation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link - https://supabase.com/docs/reference/swift/storage-from-upload - https://supabase.com/docs/reference/swift/storage-from-update ## Describe the problem - Error in the parameter name, it's not `fileOptions` but `options` - Moreover, when we upload the file in the bucket, the default content-type is `text/plain` so I suggest to add this option in the documentation especially that we're uploading a `avatar.png` in the example and it store as `text/plain` instead of `image/png` ## Describe the improvement ### Upload File ```swift let fileName = "avatar1.png" try await supabase.storage .from("avatars") .upload( path: "public/\(fileName)", file: fileData, options: FileOptions( cacheControl: "3600", contentType: "image/png", upsert: false ) ) ``` ### Update File ```swift let fileName = "avatar1.png" try await supabase.storage .from("avatars") .update( path: "public/\(fileName)", file: fileData, options: FileOptions( cacheControl: "3600", contentType: "image/png", upsert: true ) ) ``` ## Additional context Currently in the documentation: ### Upload File ![Upload File](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/9927423/6ca84030-9849-46f2-b51e-5933a0aca37c) ### Update File ![Update File](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/9927423/61659167-7edd-47c5-b7ac-9b51dc0d0f44)
